bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: RL4J: unit test failure on CUDA
bug.description:
Currently seeing this on master for CUDA only (Windows) - all tests on CPU (native backend) pass. <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/810978ab5365ba1cc965ce69b37dd8d3>https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/810978ab5365ba1cc965ce69b37dd8d3</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>Failed tests: HistoryProcessorTest.testHistoryProcessor:51 expected:<25.50000037997961> but was:<0.0> </denchmark-code>
I haven't looked into the details or tried to isolate it though.
